body_html: So I think the Poisson setup is for setting up a distribution with a single parameter across all of the generated samples, which NVIDIA calls 'the robust API', which is too slow here (I think initializing that state for each element of the tensor would be too expensive?). They have a less robust (i.e. less closely matching the Poisson distribution for certain values of lambda), used in simple_device_API_kernel .

body: So I think the Poisson setup is for setting up a distribution with a single parameter across all of the generated samples, which NVIDIA calls 'the robust API', which is too slow here (I think initializing that state for each element of the tensor would be too expensive?). They have a less robust (i.e. less closely matching the Poisson distribution for certain values of `lambda`), used in `simple_device_API_kernel `.
